hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Umar that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:"Whoever buys a palm tree that has been pollinated, its fruits belong to the seller, unless the purchaser stipulated a condition." (Sahih) Another chain from Ibn 'Umar, from the Prophet (ﷺ), with similar wording

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ بَاعَ نَخْلاً مُؤَبَّرًا أَوْ عَبْدًا لَهُ مَالٌ
chapter.eng-name: What Was Narrated Concerning One Who Sells A Pollinated Palm Tree Or A Slave Who Has Wea
